name: Silencer LD50
description:
Game For Ludem Dare 50 - Still a work in progress.

Theme was Delay the Inevitable. My thoughts leaned toward Zombie apocalypse and the game Vampire Survivors. Mostly it was an Excuse to learn more about how the Godot Engine Works.

I plan to add a more Weapons and Enemy Types.

I used pretty much all free assets from either this site, or from whatever game asset bundles I have collected.

Assets Used;

Sprites/Tilesets
  Horror City Asset Pack - Used.
  Free RPG asset Pack Ssugmi.
  Cyber Pop

Fonts:
  KongText

AUDIO:
  NintendoSFX
  Ambient Horror Music Vol. 1

Some Code Used//learned from
 HeartBeast's Action RPG Tutorial
